validateAdditionofTheProductoCartProcess() - Method in class TestPackage.CartTest
This method is to Validate that tittle and price of the product added to the cart is the same as the product selected in the home page
validateAddToCartBtn(String) - Method in class pages.Products
This method is to check that item is added and button add to cart is now Remove button
validateCartIsEmpty() - Method in class pages.Cart
This method used to validate if the cart is empty, if there's no longer items in the cart then the counter of items exists on the cart icon be no longer visible
validateOnlineOrderingFlow() - Method in class TestPackage.CheckoutTest
This method is to validate Online Ordering and complete the flow from adding element to cart till the checkout, Also Validate the price and success purchase.
validateProductInformationinCheckout(String, String, String) - Method in class pages.Checkout
This method is to validate the tittle , subtotal and total of the product in the checkout
validateRemovingProduct() - Method in class pages.Cart
This method used to validate the removing process of the product, if the item is removed then the remove button will be no longer visible

This method is to Validate removing products in the cart
